links.*: Symphony No. 1 "The Lord of the Rings"

wikitext.*:
'''Johan de Meij''' is a Dutch conductor, composer, and trombonist well known within the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] community for his "Symphony No. 1", "The Lord of the Rings". In 2018 he premiered his new Tolkien-related symphony "Symphony No. 5", commissioned by The Middle Earth Commissioning Project. De Meij nowadays lives in the NYC metro area and regularly visits Amsterdam.http://www.johandemeij.com He is still active as a conductor, including his own work worldwide. ==Tolkien-related works== * [[1984]]-[[1988]] [[Symphony No. 1 "The Lord of the Rings"]] *#Gandalf *#Lothlórien *#Gollum *#Journey in the Dark
a. The Mines of Moria
b. The Bridge of Khazad-Dûm *#Hobbits * [[2018]] [[Symphony No. 5 "Return to Middle-earth"]] *#Miri na Fëanor (Jewels of Fëanor) *#Tinúviel (Nightingale) *#Ancalagon i-môr (Ancalagon, the Black) *#Arwen Undómiel (Evenstar) *#Dagor Delothrin (The War of Wrath) *#Thuringwethil (Woman of Secret Shadow) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.euronet.nl/~amsmusic/ Official website] * [http://www.amazon.com/Lord-Rings-Symphonie-No-1/dp/B000009Q5Q Purchase Symphony No. 1 from Amazon] * [https://www.amazon.com/Return-Middle-Earth-Johan-Meij/dp/B07VD9ZNJH Purchase Symphony No. 5 from Amazon] * {{WP|Johan de Meij}} [[Category:Composers|Meij, Johan de]] [[Category:Dutch people|Meij, Johan de]] [[Category:People by name|Meij, Johan de]] [[Category:Classical music]]
